Feedback Form.emission_identified_flag_fk: Operator was aware of the leak prior to receiving the CARB plume notification
Feedback Form.additional_inspection_notes: Area was visually inspected and confirmed with handheld sensor; surrounding equipment showed no anomalies.
Feedback Form.additional_activities: Routine flare restart coincided with the detected plume; no excess venting observed.
Feedback Form.leak_description: Operator was aware of the leak prior to receiving the notification, and/or repairs were in progress on the date of the plume observation
Feedback Form.leak_cause: Leak occurred near a high-pressure flange downstream of the moisture trap; likely caused by thermal cycling.
Feedback Form.mitigation_actions: Flange gasket was replaced and all adjacent fittings re-torqued to spec. Follow-up inspection scheduled.
Feedback Form.additional_notes: System logs were reviewed and no alarms were triggered during the event; future inspections to include more frequent visual checks.
